## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:**	[Glyma.10G199000](https://legacy.soybase.org/sbt/search/search_results.php?category=FeatureName&version=Wm82.a4.v1&search_term=Glyma.10G199000)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>GmLbc2</u>
- **Gene Name:** leghemoglobin C1
- **Genome:** [Wm82.a4.v1](https://legacy.soybase.org/GlycineBlastPages/blast_descriptions.php)
- **Species:** *Glycine max*

## Functional Descriptions:
   - GmbHLH300 also affects four leghemoglobin genes (GmLba, GmLbc1, **GmLbc2**, and GmLbc3) that associate with nodule development and nitrogen fixation.
   - In addition, the expression levels of four leghemoglobin genes, GmLbc1, **GmLbc2**, and GmLbc3, were markedly downregulated under both LFe and HFe conditions, and the expression of GmLba was markedly downregulated under LFe conditions

## Function-related keywords:
   - [nitrogen](/tags/nitrogen/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[development](/tags/development/)
